title: Listen to the Metronome
itunes:summary:
Like music needs a metronome to sound good, your marriage needs a rhythm to help you stay connected. But is that possible when your schedule feels overloaded? John, Erin and Greg discuss ways to make time for your spouse, even with a crowded schedule.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Reconnected: Moving From Roommates to Soulmates in Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-08-10?refcd=1137202

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/listen-to-the-metronome/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
